title: Beautiful Larchmont STUDIO Apt - Gas, Water, Trash, Internet Inc
map_address: 637 N Bronson Ave near Melrose Ave
posting_body: CALL or TEXT for questions and showings: 31O-975-4132

It’s lovely to live in Larchmont - Directly across from the Melrose side of Paramount Studios, close walking distance to Larchmont Villiage where you can find Shops & Dining, and also a Farmers' Market on Sundays.
Vivian Apartments has completed a yearlong classically inspired Art Deco Elegant renovation of the foyer, hallways and gardens.
Owner pays for all utilities (Gas, Water, Trash, Electric, Internet) FREE WiFi!
Ample street parking on our clean, quiet little street.
Major film studios nearby have security patrols around the clock.
We accept applications from people with good credit (FICO 700) and verifiable income of 53K or more.
The price of $1795 is for single occupancy.
CALL or TEXT for questions and showings: 31O-975-4132
